alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 8:47AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS MAY IMPACT OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY THROUGH 915 AM HST... At 842 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate showers with possible embedded thunderstorms over east Oahu, primarily east of the Pali Highway, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Honolulu, Waimanalo, Hawaii Kai, Ahuimanu, Punaluu, Kahuku, Kalihi, Waiahole, Moanalua, Kaneohe Marine Base, Laie, Palolo, Kahaluu, Kailua, Manoa, Maunawili, Kaneohe, Waikane, Halawa, and Hauula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Any storm that develops could quickly intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
